nodes.text: THX: The Sound And The Fury

THX: The Sound And The Fury is an article covering the then-newly developed Dolby Digital-Surround EX that was created as a joint venture by both THX and Dolby Laboratories, Inc. that was set to debut with Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. It was conducted by Kevin Fitzpatrick and published in Star Wars Insider 42.
